GSD.description:
scsi: iscsi: Fix HW conn removal use after free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 0483ffc02ebb953124c592485a5c48ac4ffae5fe. For more details please see the references link.
